title: People giving shit advices like "YOU SHOULD HAVE HELPED YOUR TEAM, SO IT'S PARTLY YOUR FAULT TOO"
body:
I did, and this still happened:

#11 minutes in:
http://imgur.com/b25GYSg

2 of the kills I had was a double kill from TP-ing bot. After that, those efforts went into the gutter thanks to my teams' r%%%%%ed mentality to die for no reason.

#13 minutes in:
http://imgur.com/cNour90

#15 minutes in:
http://imgur.com/xGZA2Tw

#18 minutes in:
http://imgur.com/upR6boO

Team fed so hard that even one Malzahar ult can either shreds 70% of my HP or one-shots a squishy in my team. I've already reported them for Intentional Feeding, but of course, I doubt the report will ever kick in...

replies.body: I would clown on you BeatBoysFTW.   Clown on any player you think is good...

Triggered by the "All Bark No Bite" comment? Til you replied to this ditched thread instead of your own thread?

Interesting {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-popcorn}}
You died almost as much, you should probably be punished for intentional feeding as well.
Of course, there's this one guy who's desperately trying to find something which "gets back" at the OP....

Result tab at the end:

http://imgur.com/aWOrXqz

After all that fiasco, I still did the most damage:

http://imgur.com/4jBVebj
